scoringPlays.text: Hayden Hurst 62 Yd pass from Jake Bentley (Parker White Kick)
Jordan Jones 5 Yd pass from Austin Allen (Connor Limpert Kick)
Bryan Edwards 18 Yd pass from Jake Bentley (Parker White Kick)
Skai Moore 34 Yd Interception Return (Parker White Kick)
T.J. Brunson 73 Yd Fumble Return (Parker White Kick)
Ty'Son Williams 3 Yd pass from Jake Bentley (Parker White Kick)
David Williams 4 Yd Run (Two-Point Pass Conversion Failed)
Keisean Nixon 45 Yd Interception Return (Alexander Woznick Kick)
Jonathan Nance 34 Yd pass from Cole Kelley (Two-Point Pass Conversion Failed)

videos.headline: South Carolina forces fumble on first drive
videos.description: Gamecocks' DB Chris Lammons strips Razorbacks' TE Cheyenne O'Grady and South Carolina recovers to set up a field goal.

videos.headline: Bentley connects with Hurst behind Razorbacks' defense for TD
videos.description: South Carolina QB Jake Bentley airs it out for TE Hayden Hurst over the middle for a 62-yard touchdown that gives the Gamecocks a 10-3 lead.

videos.headline: Bone-crunching block sets up overturned Arkansas TD
videos.description: Arkansas WR Deon Stewart paves the way for RB David Williams with a great block for a touchdown, but the score is overturned by review.

videos.headline: Allen finishes 12-play drive with TD pass
videos.description: Razorbacks QB Austin Allen finds WR Jordan Jones on a 5-yard slant route for the tying score to make it 10-10.

videos.headline: Edwards climbs the ladder for go-ahead TD catch
videos.description: South Carolina WR Bryan Edwards makes an unbelievable grab and gets a knee down in bounds for the touchdown.

videos.headline: Third down success the key for South Carolina
videos.description: South Carolina head coach Will Muschamp says his team is making plays on third down on both sides of the ball as the Gamecocks lead the Razorbacks 17-10 at half.

videos.headline: Bentley finds August downfield to set up FG
videos.description: South Carolina TE Jacob August slips behind the Arkansas secondary and hauls in the play-action throw.

videos.headline: South Carolina's pressure forces pick-six
videos.description: Arkansas QB Austin Allen scrambles and throws an errant pass to South Carolina's Skai Moore who returns it 34 yards for the touchdown.

videos.headline: Relentless South Carolina defense scores again
videos.description: South Carolina's Dante Sawyer demolishes Arkansas QB Austin Allen and T.J. Brunson returns the fumble 73 yards for the touchdown.

videos.headline: Play-action fake frees Williams for TD
videos.description: South Carolina pours it on with a 3-yard TD pass from Jake Bentley to Ty'Son Williams to make it 41-10.

videos.headline: Williams powers ball into end zone
videos.description: Former South Carolina RB David Williams rumbles four yards for the Arkansas score and hears the boos from his former fans.

videos.headline: Gamecocks score third defensive TD
videos.description: South Carolina DB Keisean Nixon picks off Cole Kelley and returns it 45 yards for South Carolina's third defensive touchdown.

videos.headline: Kelley connects with Nance on long TD pass
videos.description: Arkansas' Cole Kelley throws a beautiful 34-yard touchdown to Jonathan Nance.

videos.headline: Muschamp: Gamecocks controlled line of scrimmage
videos.description: South Carolina head coach Will Muschamp talks about his team's resilience in the win over Arkansas and looks ahead to Week 7.

videos.headline: South Carolina follows defense to convincing victory
videos.description: A dominant third quarter and three defensive scores put the Gamecocks over the Razorbacks 48-22.
